titles.title: Extending the period of availability of amounts for continuing expenses of standing and select committees of the House through May 9, 2003.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Ney asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/9/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on April 9, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Amends House Resolution 163 to extend funding necessary for continuing expenses of standing and select committees of the House until May 9, 2003.
